name: More Demons
description: Adds additional demon difficulties above Extreme

show-list-position.name: Show List Position
show-list-position.description: Adds text that shows the position of the Demon on the list.

omega-demon-disable.name: Disable Omega Demon
omega-demon-disable.description: Disables the Omega Demon difficulty for the current Top 1 Demon (replaced with Infernal Demon instead).

disable-bg.name: Disable BG Effects
disable-bg.description: Removes the background effects from Twisted+ Demon pages.
